subject: Re: [junit] Re: junit.textui.TestRunner
msgSnippet: ... (http://oss.software.ibm.com/developerworks/opensource/license10.html), ... Huh? What published API are they not in? They are part of the javadoc and
messageBody:
--- Shane Duan <sduan@...> wrote:
> Because JUnit is under IBM public license
>
(http://oss.software.ibm.com/developerworks/opensource/license10.html),
>
> I think that there are some issues in using their source code (since
> the
> test runners are not in the published API).

Huh? What "published API" are they not in? They are part of the javadoc
and part of the source. What language in the IBM license is a problem
for you?

Regards,

Rob
